summary.p: The complete text of the Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam, by Parañcōti.
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (November 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.measure: {1} + {1} + {1} + 393 + {2} (U1 + U2 + U3 +U4) [blank guard leaf + title folio, verso blank + unnumbered folio + f1-f393 + 2 blank guard leaves].

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam: Title Page. No foliation. Verso blank.
1 folio = Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam: Invocation. No foliation. Verso blank.
393 folios = Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam: Text. Parallel Tamil foliation 1-393 and Arabic foliation 1-393. Arabic foliation 1-7 unblackened.
2 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

layoutDesc.layout: New chapter beginning on new page (U4).

additions.desc: Current BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 290 (front cover, recto).
Left marginal intertitles, from f1r, lm onwards. See selection below.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1828 by Vinson (in Vinson et al. 1866-) and to 1828 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably Ducler's provenance). By Ducler's scribe, working around 1830. Probably not before 1828 (date of the earliest internally dated Ducler's manuscript). Not later than its first mention (Burnouf 1832).

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 74.

listBibl.bibl: Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam. 1912. Cuttacaivarākiya Parañcoti māmuṉivar moḻipeyarttaruḷiya Tiruviḷaiyāṭaṟpurāṇam. Ed. by Āṟumukanāvalar. Yāḻppāṇam: Vittiyāratnākara Accukkūṭam.

Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique. Journal asiatique 10: 84-91. — See p. 88, no. 9.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris : E. Leroux. — See p. 43, no. 290.
Velanguani Arokium [Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam]. 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. BnF NAF 5443. — See p. 19, no. 38.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 66r, no. 267 290.
